abstract: Registers a set of pasteboard types that the window accepts as the destination of an image-dragging session.
overview:
## Discussion

Registering an `NSWindow` object for dragged types automatically makes it a candidate destination object for a dragging session. `NSWindow` has a default implementation for many of the methods in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingDestination] protocol. The default implementation forwards each message to the delegate if the delegate responds to the selector of the message. The messages forwarded this way are [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingDestination/draggingEntered(_:)], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingDestination/draggingUpdated(_:)], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingDestination/draggingExited(_:)], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingDestination/prepareForDragOperation(_:)], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingDestination/performDragOperation(_:)], and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingDestination/concludeDragOperation(_:)].

# registerForDraggedTypes(_:)

**Instance Method**

Registers a set of pasteboard types that the window accepts as the destination of an image-dragging session.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func registerForDraggedTypes(_ newTypes: [NSPasteboard.PasteboardType])
```

## Parameters

- **newTypes**: An array of the pasteboard types the window accepts as the destination of an image-dragging session.

## Discussion

Registering an `NSWindow` object for dragged types automatically makes it a candidate destination object for a dragging session. `NSWindow` has a default implementation for many of the methods in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingDestination] protocol. The default implementation forwards each message to the delegate if the delegate responds to the selector of the message. The messages forwarded this way are [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingDestination/draggingEntered(_:)], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingDestination/draggingUpdated(_:)], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingDestination/draggingExited(_:)], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingDestination/prepareForDragOperation(_:)], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingDestination/performDragOperation(_:)], and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingDestination/concludeDragOperation(_:)].

## Dragging Items

- **drag(_:at:offset:event:pasteboard:source:slideBack:)**: Begins a dragging session.
- **unregisterDraggedTypes()**: Unregisters the window as a possible destination for dragging operations.

items.description: Unregisters the window as a possible destination for dragging operations.
